item.title: Silab Skill Cape command codes
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

here are the command codes to ::silabcapes , ::silabcapes2 and ::silabcapes3

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10704, 1);
addItem(10705, 1);
addItem(10706, 1);
addItem(10707, 1);
addItem(10708, 1);
addItem(10709, 1);
addItem(10710, 1);
addItem(10711, 1);
addItem(10712, 1);
addItem(10713, 1);
addItem(10714, 1);
addItem(10715, 1);
addItem(10716, 1);
addItem(10717, 1);
addItem(10718, 1);
addItem(10719, 1);
addItem(10720, 1);
addItem(10721, 1);
addItem(10722, 1);
addItem(10723, 1);
addItem(10724, 1);
addItem(10725, 1);
addItem(10726, 1);
addItem(10727, 1);
addItem(10728, 1);
addItem(10729, 1);
addItem(10730, 1);
addItem(10731, 1);

		}[/code]

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes2”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10732, 1);
addItem(10733, 1);
addItem(10734, 1);
addItem(10735, 1);
addItem(10736, 1);
addItem(10737, 1);
addItem(10738, 1);
addItem(10739, 1);
addItem(10740, 1);

addItem(10754, 1);
addItem(10755, 1);
addItem(10756, 1);
addItem(10757, 1);
addItem(10758, 1);
addItem(10759, 1);

		}[/code]

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes3”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10760, 1);
addItem(10761, 1);
addItem(10762, 1);
addItem(10763, 1);
